articles.title: Planet ‘that should not exist’ is a gigantic mirror with metal clouds - The Indian Express
articles.description: This ultra-hot planet is essentially a mirror, thanks to clouds of metals. It orbits very close to its host star and it rains titanium on the planet.

articles.title: Novak Djokovic handed hefty fine for racquet abuse during Wimbledon 2023 final loss to Carlos Alcaraz - India Today
articles.description: Novak Djokovic was handed a hefty fine for his violent outburst during the Wimbledon final loss to Carlos Alcaraz on Sunday, July 16. Djokovic had smashed his racquet against the net post in anger during the match.
